review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love these cooler cups. I am getting compliments all the time.
review.name: Tried and true

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Keeps drinks cold for much longer, the purple color is beautiful in person, and stickers stick very well to the material as well!
review.name: Great Purchase

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] With some modifications it works great. I had to make my own insert to put in the bottom of the cup so monster drinks would fit. Probably wouldnt be hard to make 3D printed inserts so that even sodas can fit in it, but its frustrating that I have to do it myself. Once your drink fits, it works very well and keeps my drink cold way longer than usual!
review.name: Needs work but insulates well

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really love my cooler cup, as a college student it has come in very handy when I have class. Having a small desk, the cooler cup is helpful because it keeps my drink cold throughout the day.
review.name: Loved this!!!

review.reviewBody: I bought these for my wife, as she drinks seltzers. This won't even hold the thin canned seltzers. I'll be returning them.
review.name: Not sure what can it'll hold

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love the Sugar Crush and mug. Its my favorite so far. I have about 5 different bottles and again, its my favorite.
review.name: You Crushed it!

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love it! It's nice to have a cooler can that my typical beverage fits in properly.
review.name: Finally a Slim-can Cooler

review.reviewBody:
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It doesn't hold ice as advertised . It will hold cold id I drop a 3lb bag of ice.

I do love FACT not rust.

Create a port like Yeti to drain.

I constantly have to pour the water out.

Love the slim can cookies.

cutterhead2
review.name: It doesn't hold ice as

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love this tumbler, its cute and keeps water cool.
review.name: Very nice color and durability

review.reviewBody: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have a cabinet full of new Hydro Flasks, Yetis and Kleen Kanteens that guests are welcome to take when they visit. These were just another addition to the cabinet.
review.name: Nice two function feature

name: 12oz Slim Cooler Cup

review.reviewBody: Its a basic shimano rotor. 6 bolt, so it fits. It will stop your bike.
review.name: Its a rotor

review.reviewBody: Replaced stock tektro rotors 180 front and 160 rear. Quality of rotors is very good. Replaced pads as well. Make sure to bed your brand new rotors. Brake power has increased tremendously after 10-20 times pedaling from 3 to 10 miles per hour and after another 10-20 times from 3 to 15 miles per hour. No squeaks, no metal rubbing. Just silence while pedaling. Highly recommended rotor for your bike
review.name: Awesome replacement

review.reviewBody: Review without using the snowsuit yet. . . it seems like very nice quality. Seems warm but lightweight/movable. Is definitely on the larger size and will take some growing into but that is part of the selling point of two seasons. The pattern is nice. I'm a fan of the reflective additions.
review.name: Review without using the snowsuit

review.reviewBody: This is our second Reima snowsuit and I absolutely love this company and their products! The Reimatec is great for our 3 year old who loves playing in the snow with his dog. He easily stays outside for an hour and is kept dry thanks to the quality material, loops over the boots, and overlapped zipper. I appreciate the longer zipper in this suit as it makes it easier to wiggle on. Definitely recommend!
review.name: Amazing snowsuit keeps my kid playing outside!

review.reviewBody: Amazing quality. The suit isnt too bulky (easier for children to move around while exploring) and most of all its very warm. We have very cold winters and spend many hours outside enjoying nature in the cold and my children are always warm and can easily move around in their suit.
review.name: Waterproof Reima snow suit

review.reviewBody: The quality of the Lightweight Sandals - Bungee is terrible. The threads are sticking out, the seams are rough and rubbed feet, the sole wore out during the first week, the color of the sandals does not correspond to what is actually shown on the website. Im so disappointed with sandals. Dont cost their money
review.name: Terrible quality of sandals

review.reviewBody: Very happy about the snowsuits I bought. The sizes were perfect!
review.name: Nice quality and cute outfits

review.reviewBody: Perfectly fits my 3 year old and there is enough room for the next season. Kept him toasty warm and dry during the north east winter.

Ordered the Puhuri snowsuit but it came with a bit of damage on the detachable hood. Sent it back for exchange and got the new item in perfect condition. Exchange process was easy. The little one could not wait for winter so she can finally use it
review.name: Little one picked the color and loved it

review.reviewBody: A must for cold weather or cool wet weather here in the PNW. This is our 2nd suit, and has been amazing for keeping our active 1yo cozy as she romps around in puddles and mud and sits on wet grass etc. It's lightweight enough so she can move pretty well, and the bright colors keep her visible on a gray day.
review.name: Keeps baby warm and dry!

review.reviewBody: The snowsuit looks and feels like the same quality as the one I bought last year. This will be a size up for the coming winter as she is still wearing size 92. I am sure we will get years of use out of this.
review.name: The snowsuit looks and feels

review.reviewBody: Snowsuits for your kids that are durable, adorable, and have room to grow? No need to look anywhere else for snowsuits anymore! :raised_hands::snowflake:
review.name: :snowflake:

name: Puhuri Reimatec Winter Overall - Toddlers'

review.reviewBody: The combination of the boxy cut and jersey fabric is no Bueno- I'm usually a large in patagonia and I was swimming in this, but the fabric is also so thin that every flaw was visible. Returned.
review.name: Not flattering

review.reviewBody:
This is one of my go-tos for spring, summer and fall. It feels appropriate for a wide range of activities - dressed up with accessories for dinner or you can rock it for a casual option.
I'm 5'2" and 120 and I wear an XS. It fits me perfectly, falling just above the ankle. The torso length is great. The fabric is so soft and airy, it's great for warmer temps. My only complaint is the pockets - I wish there was a more secure cellphone pocket, but instead, I use the Patagonia Ultralight Black Hole Mini Hip pack to carry my phone and wallet.
review.name: One of my favorites

review.reviewBody: The Owen is an amazing light weight helmet that lacks no safety features or technical features. I loved mine this past year in the backcountry!!

review.reviewBody: I've gotten a few days in this season with the Owen helmet and I love it already. It's very comfortable to wear and I know that it will help keep my head safe this winter. I've had Giro helmets for a while and have been impressed with their different technologies like the MIPS system to help minimize impacts.
review.name: Love my new helmet
